              int defaultVSpeed,

              int health,

              int FIRECOOLDOWN,
              int ALTFIRECOOLDOWN,
              int defaultProjectileHeight,
              int defaultProjectileWidth,
              java.util.ArrayList<BeltSlot> beltList)
        Parameters:
        posX - - the X position of the top left of the square
        posY - - the Y position of the top left of the square
        objWidth - - the width
        objHeight - height
        defaultHSpeed - the H value that is referenced as how fast it can/ should be going
        defaultVSpeed - the V value that is referenced as how fast it can/ should be going
        health - the health of the player
        name - the name of the player
        FIRECOOLDOWN - The default value reference to stop the player from spamming the fire button
        ALTFIRECOOLDOWN - the default value reference to stop the player from spamming the alt fire button
        defaultProjectileHeight - the reference height for when the plane fires a projectile
        defaultProjectileWidth - the reference width of a fired projectile
        buttonUp -
        buttonDown -
        buttonLeft -
        buttonRight -
        buttonFire -
        buttonAltFire -

        public void drawobj​(java.awt.Graphics2D gg,
                    Map maps)
        Description copied from class: SolidObject
        given a 2d Graphics graw the object in reference to viewX and viewY of the MapView Eg: object 0,0 and the mapview 1,1 draw the object @ -1,-1 Additionally scale the object in comparision to the width and height of the map view to allow objects to appear to get bigger / smaller as the zoom changes
        Overrides:
        drawobj in class SolidObject
        Parameters:
        gg - - the Graphics 2D that the object is drawn on
        maps - - the Map that is used to draw the object relatively to the view X, Y positions
